text: Great hidden gem ! Probably the best burger I've had in the city ! Definitely try the chili cheese fries !

This place is Great! It's so clean and pristine and the people are really kind  

I got the Cabano's burger and it was delicious. It's a family owned lil sandwich shop that has a great atmosphere and right next to the Manulife centre so it's a great place to grab a quick snack before you go see a movie.
had the chicken sandwich here - delicious and juicy. little place that is as good as advertised. the staff is nice and welcoming. highly recommend!
